workers._comment3: OptimizerExplain: 0- NONE, 1- SGD, 2- MINI_BATCH_SGD, 3- MOMENTUM, 4- NAG, 5- ADAGRAD, 6- ADAM
workers._comment6: Federated options: federatedServer = name of fedServerWorker, syncCount = after how many batches to sync/update weights

sources.COMMENTS: method allowed: '1': sends each exapme to all clients listed, '2': round robin between all clients
